mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_free_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno DESC

select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_free_board pk_free_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_free_board where rownum <= #{page} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{amount}

select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_free_board pk_free_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_free_board where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND rownum <= #{page} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_free_board (bno, title, content, writer) VALUES (seq_free_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_free_board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE bno = #{bno}
